segments.text: Could I have a look at those pens ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . These are thirty yuan each and these are twenty-five .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you got anything a bit cheaper ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about these ? They are nine yuan each .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , they're not quite what I want . Sorry to trouble you .
segments.speaker: S2
